software: The four defendants and their supporters were at 'Iolani Palace shortly after being found guilty of .manslaughter and sentenced to serve a one-hour "prison term" in 1932. From left: Clarence Darrow, .chief defense counsel; defendants E.J. Lord and A.O. Jones; Maj. Gordon Ross, high sheriff; Grace .Fortescue, mother of Thalia Massie and niece of inventor Alexander Graham Bell; Thalia and Lt. .Thomas Massie; and George Leisure, defense counsel. .(Advertiser library photo - May 4, 1932)
